title: client wont start
body: i click the icon to start league and the symbol pops up like it does before the client loads but then nothing happens

replies.body: If you see the League logo pop up then disappear, it might be that your OS is blocking the application from running at all. Your OS has to have certain settings in place before it can recognize certain programs as safe. You should be able to get those permissions in place by following our [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions), but let me know if you have any problems!
